medicalDevices.title: Soft-Biopsy®
medicalDevices.subtitle: Single-use kylon® pad for gentle exocervical tissue / organ, targeted biopsy collection.

medicalDevices.title: Soft-ECC®
medicalDevices.subtitle: Endocervical kylon® tip for endocervical curettage tissue removal prior to excision.

medicalDevices.title: Soft-ECC-S®
medicalDevices.subtitle: Smaller, tapered, kylon® ECC device for nulliparous os, cervix.

testimonials.name: Sarah Connor
testimonials.text: The Soft-ECC is such a revolutionary product! The physician was very professional and thorough. The procedure was extremely fast. Just a few minutes to take my sample...

testimonials.name: Martha Stewart
testimonials.text: I was really pleased with the treatment by the head nurse and doctor immediately. They thoroughly and carefully explained the procedure and the aftercare...

testimonials.name: Jane Hopkins, MD
testimonials.text: Great innovations! Since incorporating these products, I've seen overall care improvements compared to standard devices. Much less patient anxiety as well...
